quoteText:
In order to respond to the claims of violation of the rights of third parties and/or to protect the rights, property, and safety of ASKfm, our employees, Registered and Guest Users, or the public.
This may involve the sharing of your information with law enforcement, government agencies, courts, and/or other organizations
title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
